scripts.build: mkdir -p deploy && cp -r * deploy/ || true && rm -rf deploy/node_modules && javascript-obfuscator ./script.js --output ./deploy/script.js --compact true --self-defending true --string-array true --string-array-rotate true --string-array-shuffle true --string-array-index-shift true && javascript-obfuscator ./sw.js --output ./deploy/sw.js --compact true
